sources.title: Grindr must pay €5.65 million for GDPR breach, court rules
sources.snippet: The dating app Grindr has been fined €5.65 million by the Oslo District Court following a complaint from the Norwegian Consumer Council in 2020. The court ruled that Grindr unlawfully shared sensitive user data with multiple commercial third parties. This verdict marks a significant step in safeguarding consumer privacy and security online.
